description:
Doom Explorer is a launcher for most popular Doom source ports, with user-friendly interface and a number of useful features.



Doom Explorer updated, version 2.47:

- Added Q-Zandronum support in multiplayer mode - list of servers, connection to
  the server, launch servers, etc
- Added the ability to automatically install Odamex/ZDaemon/Zandronum/Q_Zandronum ports when
  starting the game or server, adding doomport - programs are installed on the
  Doom Explorer working catalog, the "Ports" folder
- Added the ability of checking, downloading, updating Odamex/Zdaemon/Zandronum/Q_zandronum:
  Options - Updates, Doom Explorer update settings are also moved there
- Added the ability to load home page of the selected port
- Added the name of the port to the serverinfo window
- Added a window with an indicator for HTTP connections, with the ability to
  interrupt the process
- Added icons for styles in the menu
